grade_comment:
Grade: 90

Comment: The response effectively draws a parallel between the importance of avoiding idolatry in both Christian and Islamic traditions. It successfully uses relevant scripture to support the concept of worshipping the one true God and highlights the significance of remaining faithful to God's commands in worship. The inclusion of the Quranic story of Abraham and his son Ishmael adds depth to the discussion and enhances the overall comparison. Well done!
